articles.title: Bitcoin drops below US$30000 as relentless China crackdown weighs - CNA
articles.description: Bitcoin stabilised in Asian trading on Tuesday morning a day after a statement from China's central bank reaffirming the ongoing crackdown on cryptocurrencies in the country sent the world's largest token to a two-week low.
